newsitem.title: UK: Samsung to launch 300 mln mark five-year bond-DMG.
newsitem.headline: Samsung to launch 300 mln mark five-year bond-DMG.

text.p: Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd will launch a 300 million mark five-year bond, an official at Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said on Tuesday.
"We have the mandate for the deal, and it is expected to be launched on Thursday," the syndicate manager told Reuters.
He said there was no spread talk on the issue.
New issues traders elsewhere said it was difficult to predict at what spread the bond would be launched because there were few borrowers in marks with comparable credit ratings.
Samsung Electronics is rated Baa1 by Moody's and A-minus by Standard & Poor's.
"My guess is anywhere between 50 and 70 basis points over the September 2001 Bund," said a Frankfurt-based syndicate head.
